General.Name: Navitas Petroleum Limited Partnership
General.Description: Navitas Petroleum, Limited Partnership explores for and produces oil and natural gas. Its asset portfolio includes Neches field; Buckskin, Shenandoah, and Block 7 projects; and exploration prospects in Canada. The company is based in Herzliya, Israel.
